title: Disable and enable EventBridge rules with EventBridge Scheduler
description: Disable and enable an EventBridge rule on a maintenance schedule with EventBridge Scheduler.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern demonstrates using EventBridge Scheduler, a serverless scheduler that enables you to schedule tasks and events at scale, to disable and re-enable an EventBridge rule at specific days and times in a week, such as a periodic maintenance window on a weekend.

bullets.text: Call any API with EventBridge Scheduler Universal Targets
